# believe_webhook (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "believe_webhook" "example_webhook" {
  webhook_id = "webhook_id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `webhook_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) When the webhook was registered
- `description` (String) Optional description for this webhook
- `event_types` (List of String) List of event types this webhook is subscribed to
- `id` (String) Unique webhook identifier
- `secret` (String) The secret key for verifying webhook signatures (base64 encoded)
- `url` (String) The URL to send webhook events to
